alert.note: Alert for Evangeline (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Evangeline Parish through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mamou. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ville Platte, Mamou, Chataignier, Reddell and Duralde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.
